statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); git_info() { if git rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then local branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [[ -n "$branch" ]]; then printf " %s" "$branch"; fi; fi; }; kube_info() { if command -v kubectl-x &> /dev/null; then kubectl-x cur --prompt 2>/dev/null || echo ""; fi; }; format_dir() { printf "%s" "${1/#$HOME/~}"; }; printf "\033[34m%s\033[37m%s" "$(format_dir "$current_dir")" "$(git_info)"; kube_context=$(kube_info); if [[ -n "$kube_context" ]]; then printf " \033[33m%s\033[0m" "$kube_context"; fi; printf "\033[0m"
